title: Wingo Game Platform

requirements.text: Create a Wingo number prediction game backend with the following core logic: support multiple rounds (each round has a countdown timer, a winning number 0-9, and a color result: red for 1/3/7/9, green for 2/4/6/8, violet for 0/5); store player bets (player ID, round ID, bet type: number or color, bet amount); determine winners and calculate payouts (number bet pays 9x, color bet pays 2x, violet pays 4.5x); expose query functions for current round state, round history, and player bet history; expose update functions to place a bet and trigger round resolution.

quotes: Create a new platform in wingo game.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores and retrieves round state including countdown, winning number, and color result.
Players can place bets on a number (0-9) or a color (red/green/violet) for the current open round.
Round resolution correctly computes winners and payouts according to the payout rules.
Query endpoints return current round info, past round history, and per-player bet history.
Invalid bets (e.g., betting on a closed round) are rejected with an error message.

requirements.text: Build a Wingo game frontend with: a lobby/home screen showing the current round countdown timer, last 10 round results (number + color badge), a betting panel where users can select a number (0-9) or a color (Red/Green/Violet) and enter a bet amount, a Place Bet button that calls the backend, a results modal or notification showing the round outcome and whether the player won or lost, and a bet history table showing the player's past bets with outcome.

quotes: Create a new platform in wingo game.

acceptanceCriteria: Home screen displays live countdown timer for the current round.
Last 10 round results are shown with number and color-coded badges.
User can select a prediction (number 0-9 or color Red/Green/Violet) and enter an amount.
Placing a bet calls the backend and reflects confirmation or error to the user.
After round resolution, a result notification shows the winning number/color and the player's outcome (win/loss/payout).
Bet history table lists the player's previous bets with round ID, selection, amount, and result.

requirements.text: Apply a vibrant, neon-lit casino-style visual theme across the entire app: deep dark background (near-black), bright neon accent colors aligned with game colors (red, green, violet, gold for wins), bold modern typography, glowing card and button effects, and a clean grid-based layout. Render the generated logo (wingo-logo.dim_400x120.png) and background (game-bg.dim_1920x1080.png) from frontend/public/assets/generated as static assets.

quotes: Create a new platform in wingo game.

acceptanceCriteria: All screens use the deep dark background with neon accent styling.
Color badges and buttons use the game's red/green/violet color palette with glow effects.
Typography is bold and modern, maintaining readability against dark backgrounds.
Theme is consistent across the lobby, betting panel, results modal, and history table.
Logo and background images are loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated.

constraints: All backend logic must reside in a single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo).
Do not use external databases or third-party APIs.
Frontend immutable paths (hooks, main.tsx, ui components) must not be modified.

required: Neon-glowing Wingo game logo with bold stylized text on a transparent background (wingo-logo.dim_400x120.png)
Dark neon background texture with subtle grid lines and faint colored light streaks in red, green, and violet (game-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
